name: DOB
description:
A small 2D platformer game I made in Unreal Engine 5 for the GameDev.tv GameJam 2022.

Help the Alien reach the final switch.

If you fail the mission, respawn and try again with Ability Gem helpers.

Collect Gems and switch the aliens skin to activate abilities like Double Jump, Dash and Fire Ball projectiles.

Death is Only the Beginning.

Programing, Game Design, UX / UI: Zeno-Danie Görbe (me)

Visual & Audio Assets: https://www.kenney.nl/

Pixel VFX: https://codemanu.itch.io/pixelart-effect-pack

Background Music: Daniel Stephens  https://opengameart.org/users/scribe
